alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Arthur, southwestern Grant, eastern Garden and southeastern Sheridan Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 258 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, or 16 miles north of Oshkosh, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Rackett, Bourquim Hill, Dogtown Flats, Jerry Lake, Deer Lake, Adams Flats, Britton Lake and Kincaid Lake. This includes Highway 2 near mile marker 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
